content: Yes, several guest stars were considered for recurring roles on Cheers. Some notable examples include Kirstie Alley, who played Rebecca Howe for six seasons after Shelley Long left the show, and George Wendt's real-life wife, Bernadette Birkett, who played Norm's wife, Vera, in several episodes. Other guest stars who appeared in multiple episodes include John Mahoney (who later starred in Frasier), Emma Thompson, Bebe Neuwirth, and Jay Thomas.
